title: Jewish Therapists, Empathy Styles, Therapist Vibe, and Venting Emotions
description:
Dr. Kirk Honda talks about why so many early therapists were Jewish, empathy and communication styles, the vibe of a therapist, and whether or not venting emotions is helpful.

The Psychology In Seattle Podcast.

Aug 6, 2018.

Email: Contact@PsychologyInSeattle.com

List of all episodes: https://psychologyinseattle.squarespace.com/list-of-episodes

Become a patron of our podcast by going to https://www.patreon.com/PsychologyInSeattle

    

Music by Bread Knife Incident.
